# Datasets

- National Forest Boundaries: [USFS](https://data.fs.usda.gov/geodata/edw/datasets.php)
- Landsat: [USGS EROS](https://www.usgs.gov/centers/eros/science/usgs-eros-archive-products-overview?qt-science_center_objects=0#qt-science_center_objects)
- Biophysical Settings: [LANDFIRE](https://landfire.gov/)
- Digital Elevation Model (DEMs): [USGS EarthExplorer](https://earthexplorer.usgs.gov/)
- Fire perimeters: [CALFIRE](https://frap.fire.ca.gov/mapping/gis-data/)
